comment._content: OMG! What was this machine meant for? I just hope that it wasn't some type of time-warping engine that has disrupted the space-time and that is going to open a dimensional portal somewhere in the future allowing the Great Ancients to enter our dimension!!!! Ia ia Cthulhu fhtagn!
